project.name: Cognia
project.description: AI-native chat and creation application with multi-provider support
project.frontend: Next.js 16.1 with React 19.2, TypeScript 5.9, Tailwind CSS v4
project.stateManagement: Zustand v5 + Dexie v4 for IndexedDB persistence
project.ai: Vercel AI SDK v5 with 14+ providers

modules.name: app
modules.description: Next.js App Router - main application routes and layouts with standalone windows

modules.name: components
modules.description: Feature-based React components organized by domain with 50+ directories

subdirectories.designer: Visual designer (core, panels, dnd, preview, toolbar, editor)
subdirectories.providers: Provider system components (ErrorBoundary, Logger, Cache, Audio, WebSocket)
subdirectories.video-studio: Video editing components (preview, audio, generation, recording, export, composition, management, editor, timeline, effects, common)
subdirectories.a2ui: A2UI components (layout, data, display, form, academic)
subdirectories.plugin: Plugin components (config, monitoring, extension, schema, dev)

newFeatures: chat/ghost-text-overlay.tsx - Ghost text overlay for input completion

modules.name: lib
modules.description: Domain utilities and business logic with 30+ subdirectories

subdirectories.ai: AI integration (core, providers, generation, embedding, media, infrastructure, tools, rag, memory, agent, workflows, prompts, completion, routing)
subdirectories.document: Document parsing, formatting, and RAG integration
subdirectories.export: Multi-format export (Markdown, HTML, PDF, Word, Excel, diagrams)
subdirectories.vector: Vector database clients (Pinecone, Qdrant, ChromaDB, Milvus)
subdirectories.designer: Visual designer AI, export, and templates
subdirectories.media: Media utilities (subtitle-parser, video-processing, export, transitions, keyframes, progressive, webgl, codecs, workers)
subdirectories.canvas: Canvas utilities (collaboration, themes, symbols, snippets, ai, plugins) (NEW)

newFeatures: canvas/ - Canvas utilities (collaboration, themes, symbols, snippets, AI, plugins)
ai/media/ - AI media processing (adjustments, workers, WebGL, progressive loading)
ai/rag/ - Enhanced RAG utilities (adaptive-reranker, cache, citation-formatter, collection-manager, context-manager, embedding-batcher)
media/ - Enhanced media utilities (export, transitions, keyframes, progressive, WebGL, codecs, workers)

modules.name: hooks
modules.description: Custom React hooks organized by domain with 20+ directories

subdirectories.agent: Agent hooks (use-agent, use-background-agent, use-sub-agent, use-plan-executor, use-unified-tools)
subdirectories.chat: Chat hooks (use-summary, use-translate, use-artifact-detection, use-floating-position, use-draggable-fab, use-feature-routing, use-intent-detection, use-input-completion-unified, use-token-count, use-messages, use-usage-analytics, use-workflow-command)
subdirectories.context: Context hooks (use-awareness, use-context, use-project-context, use-clipboard-context, use-auto-sync, use-context-stats)
subdirectories.media: Media hooks (use-image-generation, use-speech, use-tts, use-video-analysis, use-video-generation)
subdirectories.native: Native hooks (use-native, use-notification, use-window, use-file-watcher, use-screenshot, use-autostart, use-stronghold, use-window-controls, use-screen-recording, use-selection-settings, use-snap-layouts, use-git)
subdirectories.rag: RAG hooks (use-rag, use-memory, use-vector-db, use-rag-progress, use-rag-pipeline, use-memory-provider)
subdirectories.sandbox: Sandbox hooks (use-environment, use-jupyter-kernel, use-session-env, use-virtual-env, use-sandbox, use-sandbox-db)
subdirectories.ui: UI hooks (use-global-shortcuts, use-learning-mode, use-learning-tools, use-mention, use-quote-shortcuts, use-selection-toolbar, use-copy, use-keyboard-shortcuts, use-media-query, use-clipboard-monitor, use-summary-shortcuts, use-selection-receiver, use-selection-history, use-mermaid)
subdirectories.utils: Utility hooks (use-debounce, use-mobile, use-resize-observer, use-element-resize, use-swipe-gesture, use-device)
subdirectories.image-studio: Image studio hooks (use-image-editor, use-image-editor-shortcuts, use-enhanced-image-editor, use-batch-processor, use-worker-processor)
subdirectories.video-studio: Video studio hooks (use-video-editor, use-video-timeline, use-video-subtitles, use-worker-processor)
subdirectories.a2ui: A2UI hooks (use-a2ui, use-a2ui-form, use-a2ui-keyboard, use-a2ui-data-model, use-app-builder)
subdirectories.canvas: Canvas hooks (use-canvas-suggestions, use-code-execution, use-canvas-documents, use-collaborative-session, use-chunk-loader)
subdirectories.plugin: Plugin hooks (use-plugin, use-plugin-tools, use-plugin-modes, use-plugin-components, use-plugin-permissions, use-plugin-ipc) (NEW)

modules.name: stores
modules.description: Zustand state management stores with localStorage persistence

subdirectories.agent: Agent execution tracking (agent-store, background-agent-store, sub-agent-store, custom-mode-store)
subdirectories.chat: Chat sessions, widget state (chat-store, chat-widget-store, session-store, quote-store, summary-store)
subdirectories.data: Recent files, templates, vectors (recent-files-store, template-store, vector-store, memory-store)
subdirectories.media: Media, screen recording, screenshot (media-store, image-studio-store, screen-recording-store, screenshot-store) (UPDATED)
subdirectories.settings: User preferences, presets, completion (settings-store, preset-store, custom-theme-store, settings-profiles-store, completion-settings-store) (UPDATED)
subdirectories.system: Native state, proxy, usage (native-store, proxy-store, usage-store, window-store, environment-store, virtual-env-store, ui-store, recent-files-store)
subdirectories.workflow: Workflow definitions and execution (workflow-store, workflow-editor-store, template-market-store)

modules.name: types
modules.description: TypeScript type definitions organized by domain with 20+ directories

subdirectories.core: Core chat types (message, session, chat-input, chat-history-context)
subdirectories.provider: AI provider types (provider, auto-router, memory-provider, openrouter, local-provider, load-balancer, ollama)
subdirectories.agent: Agent types (agent, agent-mode, sub-agent, background-agent, tool, tool-history)
subdirectories.document: Document and RAG types (document, document-formatting, rag, vector)
subdirectories.media: Media types (audio, video, speech, tts, subtitle, image-studio, video-processing)
subdirectories.content: Content types (prompt, prompt-template, preset, structured-output, template, prompt-marketplace)
subdirectories.learning: Learning types (learning, academic, knowledge-map, summary, animation-types, speedpass) (UPDATED)
subdirectories.system: System types (environment, sandbox, skill, tokenizer, usage, cache, compression, logger, websocket, geolocation, proxy, git, context, jupyter, selection-toolbar, tauri-plugins, webview)
subdirectories.settings: Settings types (rules, tools, welcome, chat, appearance, layout) (UPDATED)

modules.name: src-tauri
modules.description: Tauri Rust backend for native capabilities with 15+ modules

subdirectories.commands: Tauri commands (api, clipboard, context, mcp, ocr, proxy, sandbox, screen_recording, screenshot, selection, awareness, environment, jupyter, model_download, ollama, vector, git, process, academic, plugin, skill, window, devtools, extensions, storage, providers, media, system, input_completion, skill_seekers) (UPDATED)
subdirectories.context: Context detection (app_context, browser_context, editor_context, file_context, screen_content, window_info, mod)
subdirectories.mcp: MCP support (client, config, error, manager, protocol, transport, types, mod)
subdirectories.sandbox: Code execution sandbox (db, docker, languages, native, podman, runtime, mod)
subdirectories.screen_recording: Screen recording (history, recorder, video_processor, mod, progress, storage, ffmpeg, error)
subdirectories.screenshot: Screenshot system (annotator, capture, OCR, providers, region_selector, window_manager, ocr_manager, ocr_provider, windows_ocr, screenshot_history, mod)
subdirectories.selection: Selection system (analyzer, clipboard_context, clipboard_history, detector, expander, extractor, history, mouse_hook, smart_selection, toolbar_window, types, mod)
subdirectories.input_completion: Input completion system (mod, completion_service, keyboard_monitor, ime_state, config, types) (NEW)

coverage.reason: Full scan completed - all major modules and files indexed

nextSteps: Update module documentation when adding new features
Keep index.json synchronized with project changes
Consider adding API documentation for Tauri commands

newFeaturesDocs: SpeedPass learning mode - Interactive learning with textbooks, quizzes, tutorials
Input completion system - Unified @mentions, ghost text, slash commands, emoji picker
SkillSeekers - AI-powered skill discovery and execution
Enhanced canvas - Collaboration, themes, snippets, symbols, plugins
Enhanced media processing - WebGL acceleration, worker pools, progressive loading
Screenshot editor - Annotation, magnifier, color picker

recentChanges.summary: Major feature additions including SpeedPass learning mode, input completion system, SkillSeekers, enhanced canvas collaboration, and improved media processing
newModules: SpeedPass learning system (lib/learning/speedpass, components/speedpass, hooks/learning, stores/learning)
